name: Search Nodes
description: Look for nodes in the given sub tree based on the stringified values of their attributes

configStructure.name: attributeName
configStructure.displayName: Name of the attribute to filter
configStructure.description: Name of the attribute that will be tested against the keyword.

configStructure.name: searchPattern
configStructure.description: Regular expression without any modifier and the bounding slash characters.

configStructure.name: matchCase
configStructure.description: Tells whether search should go in a case sensitive mode or should ignore capitalization only differences.
